abbreviation.description: The abbreviation used by astronomers for the item

accessibility_description.description: Description of an item in a way, that accessible software like VoiceOver can describe the item for visually impaired users.

api_support.description: Defines the three levels of POLOS API support

automation_label.description: The automation level is used to synchronise POLIS data sets with external systems (e.g. ASCOM

copyright_holder_note.description: Complete copy of the text that a copyright holder gives his/her permission an information item (e.g. image) to be use by the POLIS Service providers.

copyright_holder_reference.description: The name and the email address of the copyright holder.

copyright_holder_type.description: Defines the type of the copyright permission for usage of an item (e.g. an image).

earth_country.description: Country name like France or Nepal.

phone_number.description: Phone number with international country code (e.g. +1xxxxxxxxx).

external_references.description: External references connecting the item with external source of data, e.g. RTML or VO IDs, or URLs to describing documentation

facebook_ids.description: Array of valid facebook IDs as strings. The IDs represent only the part after the www.facebook.com base URL.

id.description: Unique ID in the formal of a standard UUID

instagram_ids.description: Array of valid instagram IDs as strings

last_update.description: Date and time of the last change of the item in an ISO format, e.g. 2023-07-11T01:17:32Z represented as a string

lifecycle_status.description: Defines the readiness of an item to be actively used.

mirror_id.description: Unique ID in the formal of a standard UUID, similar to id

mode_of_operation.description: Defines the mode of operation (and therefore, the level of authomation) of corresponding POLIS Item.

name.description: The name of the item. Recommended to be (semi) unique, but this is not required

note.description: Free text string, that could be formatted with new lines, tabs. etc. and has no size limit. Nevertheless. Too long notes should be avoided.

original_source.description: The source of external information. Most often it represents an URL

ownership_type.description: Defines the type of the POLIS Service Provider.

place.description: The name of the place on Earth or any other Solar system body

provider_type.description: Defines the type of the POLIS Service Provider.

region_name.description: Defines the name of the region (either Earth or another Solar system body).

rough_direction.description: Rough direction represented as a string.

reachability_status.description: Defines how reachable is the POLIS Service Provider.

skype_ids.description: Array of valid skype IDs as strings

twitter_ids.description: Array of valid twitter IDs as strings

unit.description: The unit of a PolisPropertyValue as a string.

url.description: Well formated URL including the protocol, e.g. https://polis.net .

value.description: The value of a PolisPropertyValue as a string.

value_kind.description: Defines the value type of the property, e.g. Int, Double, ...

version.description: Semantic Version of the POLIS implementation (see: SemanticVersioning: https: //semver.org)

whatsapp_ids.description: Array of valid WhatsApp IDs as strings

gravitational_body_relationship.description: Defines the relationship between the observatory and it's gravitational body.

place_in_the_solar_system.description: The gravitational body the observatory is associated with.

observing_facility_code.description: Commonly used codes for the observatory.

solar_system_body_name.description: Name of the solar system body the observatory is associated with.

orbiting_around_place_in_the_solar_syste.description: The place in the solar system under which the observatory is orbiting (if applicable).

astronomical_code.description: The International Astronomical Union (IAU) Minor Planet Centre (MPC) code (if applicable).

parent_observing_facility_id.description: The UUID of the parent observing facility.

sub_observing_facility_ids.description: The UUIDs of any sub-observing facilities.

start_date.description: The starting date of the observing facility in.

end_date.description: The ending/closing date of the observing facility.
The ending/closing date of the observing facility.

polis_registration_date.description: The ending/closing date of the observing facility.

polis_disconnection_date.description: The ending/closing date of the observing facility.

website.description: Well formated URL including the protocol of the observing facility.

scientific_objectives.description: The scientific objectives of the object.

access_restrictions.description: Any access restrictions to the observing facility (e.g. snow in certain months, wildfire risk).

average_clear_nights_per_year.description: Average number of clear nights per year experienced at the observing facility.

traditional_land_owners.description: The traditional land owners upon which the observing facility is located.
